merchant.textOne: If you have any questions regarding your order, please contact the seller directly
merchant.textTwo:
If necessary, the seller will provide further instructions regarding the use or delivery of the service/product.
You can read the terms of service here:

order.mainHeader: Failed to charge your payment card

information.paymentFailedText: Your order could not be charged. This could be because your payment card has expired, your card is not valid for online payments or you have insufficient funds. Check your card’s settings with your bank without delay.
information.cardUpdateText: To update your payment card details, please visit:
information.cardLinkedText: A new attempt will be made to charge the payment card
information.cardLinkedRetryPaymentText: linked to your subscription within a few days. If the new attempt to charge the card is unsuccessful, your right to use the subscribed service will expire on
